David (Dahveed) Wong-Campos is a group leader at HHMI Janelia Research Campus. His lab is interested in understanding the fundamental limits of measurement in live biological samples.

Here's a [interview](https://www.janelia.org/news/joining-janelia-david-wong-campos) of David.
